entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 3.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers except a few flurries over higher terrain in the morning. Snow level rising to 1100 metres in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 14 January 2023
